MemoryInfobox.location: Leader House, Argolis|Leader House, Argos, Argolis

General_Description: '''An Arm and a Leg''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''How much does a temple cost? Head southeast to the [[Sanctuary of Asklepios]]. In the [[Epidauros Sanctuary|temple]], you'll find me among the donated limbs.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
